lead_paragraph: CAPLAN--Ann. Died peacefully at her home in Northampton, MA on July 18, 2016 with her family at her side. She is survived by her husband Jeff Caplan, her children Jamie and John Caplan and her daughters-in-law Jennifer DiGrazia and Jill Caplan. She was Grannie Annie to Jacob Caplan, Jordan DiGrazia Caplan, Sam and Ella Caplan. Funeral services Wednesday, July 20th, 1:00pm at Congregation Bnai Israel, 253 Prospect Street, Northampton, MA. Donations may be made to the Michael J. Fox Foundation for Parkinson's Research. For further information or directions please visit www.ascher zimmerman.com. 1/3
